column4: OK: So sorry to spend everyone's time so badly here.  Here's the last question, if I can't get an answer then I'll leave you to let you take other folk's questions. ;)

ok, so after the box boots, it says "Enter Password for default keyring to unlock" and the normal usr password unlocks it.  I just need the box to boot!  Is there any workaround to get past this thingy!?
you can make gnome-keyring remember passwords, there is normally a checkbox for this
